article_metadata.description: Republicans have pledged to pass an ObamaCare extension, but only to protect people from further ObamaCare damage in the short term. In the longer term, Congress is making plans to turn this into an opportunity to give the American people more of the choices they want – options for policies approved by their states with more flexible and affordable benefit packages.
article_metadata.author: Grace-Marie Turner

og.title: Cleaning Up The ObamaCare Mess
